name: Bitcoin Lottery Protocol Meta Game Pass
description: The Bitcoin Lottery Protocol trustless drawings bridges the gap between players and game creators. Games are backed up by the full power of Chainlink VRF Random Number Generator and Chainlink Keepers. Become a member and create your own Games, NFTs, Utility Token, Governance Tokens and No Loss Lottery Deflationary Distribution Mechanism with the help of the Lottery Chain Launchpad.
